name: EventingUpdate
0:
”Alexa ask Eventing Update who won Badminton last year”
”What are the dates for Badminton”
”tell me about Mark Todd”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eventing update
des:
The sport of Eventing or Horse Trials attracts 100s of 1,000s of visitors to events every year and many more followers around the globe. 

During the event we will provide up to the minute, live results of the sport using the official scores. 

Please rate and review the skill to enable us to keep developing based on your feedback. You can also provide feedback or requests to eventing@boldstart.co.uk. We are also planning a flash briefing skill to access news from the event.

For more information visit: boldstart.co.uk/eventing-alexa-skill 

Coming Soon:

Find out about any horse or rider, for example:
Alexa, where did Paul Tapner finish in the cross country
Alexa, tell me who had problems at fence 17
Alexa, where did Sam Griffith finish after dressage
Alexa, what was Emily King's dressage score
Alexa, what percentage of the field finished cross country
Plus: a flash briefing skill to access news from the event.

More details: http://boldstart.co.uk/eventing-alexa-skill/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
